Calendar

Drivers

Learn about the 20 drivers competing in the 2022 Formula 1 championship including Max Verstappen, the defending World Drivers' Champion, who is looking to win his 2nd championship this year.

Teams

Find out more about the 10 teams competing for the World Constructors' Championship. Mercedes are the reigning champions, and they face fierce competition from the likes of Ferrari and Red Bull.
